Apps.Name: Basics
Apps.Description: Basic Interface for the Wireless Inventors Kit Introduction to the kit, Learn to remotely control input and output, Perform more advanced remote analog input and output, Enjoy playing with remote light emitting diodes

Apps.Name: Graphs
Apps.Description: Wireless Inventors Kit Graphing applications. Display graphs based on data from the analog inputs.

Advanced.Name: Update from Zip File
Advanced.Description: Update using a downlaoded zip file

Advanced.Name: Update Arduino Files
Advanced.Description: Update your local Skectchbook with the LLAPSerial Library and the WIKSketch example files
